SEARCH

接口 Shape

所有超级接口:
Comparable<Shape>
所有已知实现类:
AbstractShape, Circle, Rectangle, Triangle
public interface Shape extends Comparable<Shape>
This interface contains all operations that all types of shapes should support.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    double
    area()
    Computes and returns the area of this shape.
    double
    distanceFromOrigin()
    Returns the distance of this shape from the origin.
    double
    perimeter()
    Computes and returns the perimeter of this shape.
    Shape
    resize(double factor)
    Create and return a shape of the same kind as this one, resized in area by the provided factor

    从接口继承的方法 java.lang.Comparable

    compareTo

  • 方法详细资料

    • distanceFromOrigin

      double distanceFromOrigin()
      Returns the distance of this shape from the origin. The distance is measured from whatever reference position a shape is (e.g. a center for a circle)
      返回:
      the distance from the origin

    • area

      double area()
      Computes and returns the area of this shape.
      返回:
      the area of the shape

    • perimeter

      double perimeter()
      Computes and returns the perimeter of this shape.
      返回:
      the perimeter of the shape

    • resize

      Shape resize(double factor)
      Create and return a shape of the same kind as this one, resized in area by the provided factor
      参数:
      factor - factor of resizing
      返回:
      the resized Shape
